name: Disaronno Sour
preparation:
This three-ingredient classic is a great way to highlight amaretto. The recipe dates back to the 1970s when this cocktail was a staple on cocktail menus and this version, made with Disaronno, will have you yearning for the days of bell bottoms and disco. Try this recipe for the Disaronno Sour.

Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.
